programme.title: US power and responsibility abroad
programme.short_synopsis: Examining America's responsibilities for protecting life and 'liberty' around the world.
programme.medium_synopsis: Kosovo, Iraq, Haiti and Nicaragua: US rhetoric and responsibility for life and liberty abroad is compared to past problems of power and responsibility for the British Empire.
